Message.Title: why the big concern on rates nudging up?
Message.Msg: It makes no sense to punish T with it's 5% dividend and a history of raising the amt paid. Rates would have to sky rocket to catch up. I'm adding to my holdings not selling.
All those in favor of Echo taking Holder's place let's see your thumb up.

Topic.Title: Obama admin Sibelius refuses to help dying girl

Message.Msg: Emotion driven distortion of facts without thinking or looking into the truth of the matter. There are no death panels in ObamaCare, never were, never will be. The issue is there are only so many donor lungs to go around, and people die every day because they didn't get one. Sebelius, contrary to your distortion, is trying to help this particular child get priority for a lung. Beyond ridiculous, your comments.
You sound like one of those people that doesn't believe that Obama first learned of IRS abuse by reading a newspaper.
I doubt that anyone is foolish enough to sell AT&T short. There are so many much better opportunities for shorting. T is about to move up nicely in June.

Topic.Title: why the big concern on rates nudging up?

Message.Msg: You make a lot of sense with that statement, but it always hurts dividend stocks when rates go up, the only thing i could think of is people feel better with treasures with no state and local tax and they are safer,, T on the other hand, hasnt had a revenue growth in quite sometime, you just dont know how safe the divvy is,,, We all thought GM was safe look what happened...

Topic.Title: Obama admin Sibelius refuses to help dying girl

Message.Msg: "There are no death panels in ObamaCare, never were, never will be. " Sebelius", contrary to your distortion, is trying to help this particular child get priority for a lung. Beyond ridiculous Although the words death panel are not used specifically in Obamacare it does exist and as pointed out previously in this string Sibelius is in charge of it and in this case acted as head executioner by not signing the waiver to save this little girl. She gets to choose life or death by deciding who gets care and who doesn't and decided death for this girl. It took a judge to overide her decision. If anyone is distoring the facts it is you. If anyone doesn't believe there is a death panel just read the info available from the various news outlets about this case, it demonstrates what is in store for you under Obamacare. If Sibelius can make a chioce not to save a little girls life just think of what is in store for you. A federal judge on Wednesday ordered HHS Secretary Kathleen Sebelius to allow 10-year-old Sarah Murnaghan to be moved to the adult lung transplant list, giving her a better chance of receiving a potentially life-saving transplant. My prayers are with you Sarah Murnaghan
